title: Early Childhood Storytelling Education Design Workshop Using Wordless Picture Books

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of early childhood education and fundamental digital tool usage
context.additional_context: For corporate science education trainers, learning storytelling techniques via wordless picture books to enhance scientific thinking in early childhood education

learning_goals: Learners can present three or more strategies to foster young children’s creative storytelling by analyzing visual elements in wordless picture books.
Learners can design and demonstrate processes for converting scientific concepts into storytelling aligned with young children’s developmental stages.
Learners can complete practical projects for planning and operating effective storytelling activities for young children in digital environments.

resources: Science Concept Maps by Early Childhood Development Stages

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
